title.en: David Speaks of the Holy One

en: King David writes of hope beyond the grave.
He also records words about one whom the Lord exalts.

lines: Therefore my heart is glad and my tongue rejoices;
my body also will rest secure,
because you will not abandon me to the grave,
nor will you let your Holy One see decay.
The Lord says to my Lord:

question.en: What do you notice about the hope described here—and about the one whom the Lord exalts?
